short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Import custom data, preview and user images from your Amazon orders into Veeqo! Display in Item/Customer Notes, and packing slips.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of copying and pasting customization from your Amazon orders into Veeqo? Let CustomSync do it automatically!

Import custom data, preview and user images! View images on-screen and on packing slips and invoices.

CustomSync checks your Veeqo orders every 5 minutes. When it finds new Amazon orders it extracts the personalization/customization data and populates it into "Item Notes" and "Customer Notes" on Veeqo.

You can choose to display the customization in "Item Notes", "Customer Notes" or both!

Customization and images can be configured to display on packing slips and invoices too.

You can even exclude specific customization fields.
Choose what info is displayed by including or excluding:
Surface names
Labels
Font color
Item names
SKU
Quantity

Get your time back with CustomSync!

*To run properly, Chrome must be left open and you must remain logged into Amazon Seller Central on the same browser.
